organic.title: S. Mark Taper Foundation Imaging Center-Taper Building
organic.snippet: Taper Building is located at 8705 Gracie Allen Drive at the corner of San Vicente Boulevard across from the Beverly Center.

organic.title: Imaging Center - Cedars-Sinai
